name: ssiin
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wss(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wss(c0, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wss(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wss(c0, c2)))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wss(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wss(c0, c2)))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)

|- wb(wss(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wss(c0, c2)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

comment: Subset theorem for an indexed intersection. (Contributed by NM, 15-Oct-2003.)
